nodeList.loreText: The might of a volcano swirling in the palm of your hand
nodeList.nodeDescription: Casts a fiery orb that spews burning shrapnel in all directions.

nodeList.description: {Shrapnel}, {Explosive Orb} and {Fire Glyph} have a chance to chill enemies.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Volcanic orb's shrapnel has [20%] chance to chill per point

node.altText: Frozen orb scales with increases to cold damage not fire damage.\n\nThe orb itself has a freeze rate of 40, the shrapnel has a freeze rate of 32, and explosions created at the start or end have a freeze rate of 100.
node.description: Volcanic Orb is converted into Frozen Orb. Base fire damage is converted to cold for Frozen Orb and the skill effects it creates. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not with increases to fire damage.
node.nodeDescription: 100% of fire damage converted to cold for volcanic orb and all other skill effects it creates.

node.loreText: The might of a volcano swirling in the palm of your hand
node.nodeDescription: Casts a fiery orb that spews burning shrapnel in all directions.

nodeList.description: {Shrapnels} hits deal more damage against chilled enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Volcanic orb's shrapnel deals [25%] more damage to chilled enemies per point

node.description: {Shrapnel}, {Explosive Orb} and {Fire Glyph} have a chance to chill enemies.
node.nodeDescription: Volcanic orb's shrapnel has [20%] chance to chill per point

node.altText: Frozen orb scales with increases to cold damage not fire damage.\n\nThe orb itself has a freeze rate of 40, the shrapnel has a freeze rate of 32, and explosions created at the start or end have a freeze rate of 100.

node.nodeDescription: 100% of fire damage converted to cold for volcanic orb and all other skill effects it creates.

node.loreText: The might of a volcano swirling in the palm of your hand
node.nodeDescription: Casts a fiery orb that spews burning shrapnel in all directions.

nodeList.description: {Shrapnel} travels faster, causing it to also travel further. Shrapnel is created more frequently.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Shrapnel emitted by the volcanic orb travels [5%] faster and further per point. Volcanic orb emits shrapnel [5%] more frequently per point.

node.loreText: The might of a volcano swirling in the palm of your hand
node.nodeDescription: Casts a fiery orb that spews burning shrapnel in all directions.

nodeList.altText: If you have taken the {Explosive Ground} node, Volcanic Orb leaves Explosive Ground more frequently.
nodeList.description:
Volcanic Orb core and {Shrapnel} deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Volcanic Orb has a duration of 2 seconds. 

If you have taken the {Explosive Ground} node, Volcanic Orb leaves Explosive Ground more frequently.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Volcanic orb's base duration is reduced to 2 seconds, but it deals 30% increased damage with the orb and shrapnel.

node.description: {Shrapnel} travels faster, causing it to also travel further. Shrapnel is created more frequently.
node.nodeDescription: Shrapnel emitted by the volcanic orb travels [5%] faster and further per point. Volcanic orb emits shrapnel [5%] more frequently per point.

node.nodeDescription: Casts a fiery orb that spews burning shrapnel in all directions.

node.description: Volcanic Orb's core deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), and it accelerates, moving faster for each second it exists.
node.nodeDescription: The central orb deals [35%] increased damage on hit per point. Every second, Volcanic Orb's speed is increased by [15%] per point.

nodeList.altText: {Explosive Ground} scales with increases to fire damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.
nodeList.description: Volcanic Orb leaves {Explosive Ground} more frequently, but costs more mana.

node.altText:
{Explosive Ground} scales with increases to fire damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree.

Modifiers to the damage of Volcanic Orb's core also apply to Explosive Ground.
node.description: Volcanic Orb leaves {Explosive Ground} as it travels, which explode after 3 seconds, dealing fire damage to enemies within its area of effect. Volcanic Orb costs significantly more mana.
node.nodeDescription: Volcanic orb leaves explosive ground as it travels. 50% increased mana cost.

node.description: Volcanic Orb's core, {Shrapnel} and {Explosive Orb} hits deal more damage, but Volcanic Orb costs more mana and has less cast speed (multiplicative with other modifiers).

node.nodeDescription: Casts a fiery orb that spews burning shrapnel in all directions.
